description: System-generated primary key uniquely identifying this specific-date schedule record.
Identifier of the asset–procedure schedule this specific date belongs to; likely a foreign key linking to the maintenance plan for a particular asset and procedure; confirm with SME.
The explicit calendar date/time when the maintenance occurrence is intended to take place for the linked asset–procedure schedule.
System-maintained timestamp of the most recent update to this record, used for change tracking and synchronization.
Timestamp captured by the user auditing subsystem for the most recent change; may mirror the system last-modified time; confirm with SME.
Flag indicating whether this record originated from an external import process (1) or was created within the application (0); confirm coding.
User account that created this record, for audit and ownership purposes.
Timestamp when the record was initially created by a user.
User account that last updated this record, captured for audit trails.
Timestamp of the most recent user-initiated update to this record.
